Description: Painted calcite shabti of Tamery with a short blue lappet-wig, the facial features traced in black, a black and green collar, crossed arms in low relief and traced in black, the front of the legs are inscribed with two columns of black painted Hieroglyphs, the figure bears traces of green glaze.
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Somerset Lowry-Corry, 2nd Earl of Belmore
